name: ACE (Hinkarn)
description:
A challenging side-scrolling space shooter with a catch! When you get hit, the room slowly shrinks on you! How far will you get without getting crushed?

This is our first game we’ve made, so we hope that at least somebody finds this entertaining. As an added bit of fun, post your highscore and level below!

WASD / Arrow Keys to move
Z / P to shoot
F11 to toggle fullscreen
ESC to pause

Music by AzureFlux, who was not involved in this project: Song link, License
